original_text: Some of the disciples from Caesarea accompanied us and brought us to the home of Mnason, where we were to stay. He was a man from Cyprus and one of the early disciples.
korean_text: 가이사랴의 몇 제자가 함께 가며 한 오랜 제자 구브로 사람 나손을 데리고 가니 이는 우리가 그의 집에 머물려 함이라

sentences.original_text: Some of the disciples from Caesarea accompanied us
sentences.korean_translation: 가이사랴로부터 온 몇몇 제자들이 우리와 동행했다

sentences.original_text: and brought us to the home of Mnason
He was a man from Cyprus
and one of the early disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 초대 제자 중 한 사람이었다
